member.name: P:DiscordSharp.Objects.DiscordChannel.Bitrate
member.summary: (Voice only) The channel's configured bitrate, in bps (bits per second). It's highly recommended you use this as opposed to your own bitrate. To retrieve the bitrate in kbps, divide by 1000.

member.returns: The URL of the user's avatar.

member.summary: Kicks this DiscordMember from the guild that's assumed from their parent property.

member.name: M:DiscordSharp.Objects.DiscordMember.Copy
member.summary: Testing copy method.
member.returns: A copied member, idk what more you expected

member.name: M:DiscordSharp.Objects.DiscordMember.Ban(System.Int32)

member.name: T:DiscordSharp.Objects.DiscordMessage
member.summary: Message to be sent

member.name: F:DiscordSharp.Opcodes.DISPATCH
member.summary: Received only. When a regular event is dispatched (defined in T)

member.name: F:DiscordSharp.Opcodes.HEARTBEAT
member.summary: Received and sent out to verify a connection is still alive.

member.name: F:DiscordSharp.Opcodes.IDENTIFY
member.summary: Sent only: initiates and starts a new connection

member.name: F:DiscordSharp.Opcodes.PRESENCE
member.summary: Sent only: Updates the presence of the current user.

member.name: F:DiscordSharp.Opcodes.VOICE_STATE
member.summary: Sent only: initiates a connection to a voice server or updates an existing one.

member.name: F:DiscordSharp.Opcodes.VOICE_PING
member.summary: Sent only: for the ping time to the voice server.

member.name: F:DiscordSharp.Opcodes.RESUME
member.summary: Sent only: Second way to initiate a connection. Resumes an existing one.

member.name: F:DiscordSharp.Opcodes.RECONNECT
member.summary: Received only: tells the client to reconnect to a new gateway.

member.name: F:DiscordSharp.Opcodes.REQUEST_MEMBERS
member.summary: Sent only: asks the server for a list of particular members in a guild.

member.name: F:DiscordSharp.Opcodes.INVALIDATE_SESSION
member.summary: Received only: tells the client to invalidate and re-identify.

member.summary: The URL to connect to.

member.name: P:DiscordSharp.Sockets.IDiscordWebSocket.IsAlive
member.summary: Whether or not the socket is alive.

member.name: E:DiscordSharp.Sockets.IDiscordWebSocket.MessageReceived
member.summary: Occurs when the websocket receives a message.

member.name: E:DiscordSharp.Sockets.IDiscordWebSocket.SocketClosed
member.summary: Occurs when the socket is closed.

member.name: E:DiscordSharp.Sockets.IDiscordWebSocket.SocketOpened
member.summary: Occurs when the socket is opened.

member.name: E:DiscordSharp.Sockets.IDiscordWebSocket.SocketError
member.summary: Occurs when the socket receives an error.

member.name: M:DiscordSharp.Sockets.WebSocketSharpSocket.HookupEvents
member.summary: Hooks up events to automatically be redirected to the interface's events.

member.name: P:DiscordSharp.DiscordVoiceConfig.Channels
member.summary: The amount of channels you wish to send over the network. Use 2 for stereo. Stereo will require more bandwidth.

member.name: P:DiscordSharp.DiscordVoiceConfig.FrameLengthMs
member.summary: The frame length, in ms, of audio you'll be sending at one time. As a rule of thumb, you generally want to set it to something above your current Discord ping.

member.name: P:DiscordSharp.DiscordVoiceConfig.Bitrate
member.summary: The voice client now auto-configures this based on the channel.

member.name: P:DiscordSharp.DiscordVoiceConfig.OpusMode
member.summary: The mode the Opus encoder will use. MusicOrMixed is generally the best.

member.name: P:DiscordSharp.DiscordVoiceConfig.SendOnly
member.summary: If true, the voice client will only send voice and will not receive it.

member.name: P:DiscordSharp.DiscordVoiceConfig.PCMBlockSize
member.summary: The blocksize of PCM data you should be reading and piping into DiscordSharp.

member.name: F:DiscordSharp.DiscordVoiceClient.msToSend
member.summary: The length, in ms, of audio for DiscordSharp to send. By default, 20.

member.name: F:DiscordSharp.DiscordVoiceClient.___sequence
member.summary: An signed short designating the sequence of the audio being sent.

member.name: F:DiscordSharp.DiscordVoiceClient.___timestamp
member.summary: Unsigned int designating the timestamp offset of the audio being sent.

member.name: M:DiscordSharp.DiscordVoiceClient.Initiate
member.summary: Begins the voice client connection.

member.name: M:DiscordSharp.DiscordVoiceClient.SendIPOverUDP(DiscordSharp.DiscordIpPort)
member.summary: Sends our IP over UDP for Discord's voice server to process. Also sends op 1
member.param: The byte[] returned after sending your ssrc.

member.name: M:DiscordSharp.DiscordVoiceClient.SendVoice(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Enqueues audio to be sent through the UDP client.
member.param: PCM audio data.

member.name: M:DiscordSharp.DiscordVoiceClient.ClearVoiceQueue
member.summary: Clears the voice queue thus stopping the audio.

member.name: M:DiscordSharp.DiscordVoiceClient.EchoPacket(DiscordSharp.DiscordAudioPacket)
member.summary: Echos a given DiscordAudioPacket.

member.name: M:DiscordSharp.DiscordVoiceClient.SendPacket(DiscordSharp.DiscordAudioPacket)
member.summary: Sends a given DiscordAudioPacket over the UDP client..

member.name: M:DiscordSharp.DiscordVoiceClient.SetSpeaking(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Whether or not the current client is set to be speaking.
member.param: If true, you will be set to speaking.

member.summary: The class that contains the end points needed by DiscordSharp.

member.name: P:DiscordSharp.DiscordProperties.Browser
member.summary: The "browser" you're using.

member.summary: Whatever device you want to be on. (Default: DiscordSharp Bot)

member.summary: Default constructor setting the OS property to Environment.OSVersion.ToString();

member.returns: Json string of this object serialized

member.summary: If this is true, the account this client is running on is a special bot account.

member.name: P:DiscordSharp.DiscordClient.CurrentGatewayURL
member.summary: The URL that the client websocket is currently connected to.

member.name: P:DiscordSharp.DiscordClient.ClientPrivateInformation
member.summary: Any private information assosciated with the account (regular clients only)

member.name: P:DiscordSharp.DiscordClient.DiscordProperties
member.summary: Custom properties containing parameters such as * OS * Referrer * Browser Used by Discord internally for connection.

member.name: P:DiscordSharp.DiscordClient.Me
member.summary: The current DiscordMember object assosciated with the account you're connected to.

member.summary: Returns the debug logger used to log various debug events.

member.summary: Returns the last debug logger for when the voice client was last connected.

member.name: P:DiscordSharp.DiscordClient.EnableVerboseLogging
member.summary: If true, the logger will log everything. Everything.

member.name: P:DiscordSharp.DiscordClient.DiscordGatewayVersion
member.summary: The version of the gateway.

member.name: F:DiscordSharp.DiscordClient.SessionID
member.summary: V4 related things. Getting this means our session has been successfully initiated.

member.name: F:DiscordSharp.DiscordClient.Sequence
member.summary: The last sequence we received used for v4 heartbeat.

member.name: P:DiscordSharp.DiscordClient.Autoconnect
member.summary: Whether or not to send Opcode 6 (resume) upon a socket being closed.

member.name: F:DiscordSharp.DiscordClient.RemovedMembers
member.summary: Testing.

member.name: P:DiscordSharp.DiscordClient.WriteLatestReady
member.summary: Whether or not to write the latest READY upon receiving it. If this is true, the client will write the contents of the READY message to 'READY_LATEST.txt' If your client is connected to a lot of servers, this file will be quite large.

member.name: P:DiscordSharp.DiscordClient.RequestAllUsersOnStartup
member.summary: Whether or not to request all users in a guild (including offlines) on startup.

member.name: F:DiscordSharp.DiscordClient.MessageLog
member.summary: A log of messages kept in a KeyValuePair. The key is the id of the message, and the value is a DiscordMessage object. If you need raw json, this is contained inside of the DiscordMessage object now.

member.name: E:DiscordSharp.DiscordClient.GuildAvailable
member.summary: Occurs when a guild becomes available after being unavailable.

Messages before this message ID.

member.summary: Creates a new Opus decoder.
member.param: Sampling rate of the input PCM (in Hz). Supported Values: 8000, 12000, 16000, 24000, or 48000
Length, in milliseconds, of each frame. Supported Values: 2.5, 5, 10, 20, 40, or 60

member.summary: Produces PCM samples from Opus-encoded audio.
member.param: PCM samples to decode.
Offset of the frame in input.
Buffer to store the decoded frame.

member.name: P:DiscordSharp.Voice.OpusEncoder.BitRate
member.summary: Gets the bit rate in kbit/s.

member.name: P:DiscordSharp.Voice.OpusEncoder.Application
member.summary: Gets the coding mode of the encoder.

member.name: M:DiscordSharp.Voice.OpusEncoder.#ctor(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Nullable{System.Int32},DiscordSharp.Voice.OpusApplication)
member.summary: Creates a new Opus encoder.
member.param: Sampling rate of the input signal (Hz). Supported Values: 8000, 12000, 16000, 24000, or 48000
Number of channels in input signal. Supported Values: 1 or 2
Length, in milliseconds, that each frame takes. Supported Values: 2.5, 5, 10, 20, 40, 60
Bitrate (kbit/s) used for this encoder. Supported Values: 1-512. Null will use the recommended bitrate.
Coding mode.

member.summary: Produces Opus encoded audio from PCM samples.
member.param: PCM samples to encode.
Offset of the frame in pcmSamples.
Buffer to store the encoded frame.
member.returns: Length of the frame contained in outputBuffer.

member.name: T:DiscordSharp.WebWrapper
member.summary: Convienent wrapper for doing anything web related.

member.name: M:DiscordSharp.WebWrapper.Delete(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Sends a DELETE HTTP request to the specified URL using the specified token.

member.name: M:DiscordSharp.WebWrapper.Put(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Sends a PUT HTTP request to the specified URL using the specified token.

member.name: M:DiscordSharp.WebWrapper.Post(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Sends a POST HTTP request to the specified URL, using the specified token, sending the specified message.

member.name: M:DiscordSharp.WebWrapper.Post(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Sends a POST HTTP request to the specified URL, without a token, sending the specified message.

member.name: M:DiscordSharp.WebWrapper.Patch(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Sends a POST HTTP request to the specified URL, using the specified token, sending the specified message.

member.name: M:DiscordSharp.WebWrapper.Get(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Sends a GET Request to the specified url using the provided token.
member.returns: The raw string returned. Or, an error.
